snomedizer 0.1.0
  • Reference

Flatten results from a server request

result_flatten.Rd

A function to flatten nested server results from an api_operations into a single non-nested data frame

result_flatten(x)

Arguments

x

an `httr` response() object

Value

a data frame

See also

Other utilities: result_completeness(), snomed_public_endpoint_suggest(), snomedizer_options

Examples

result_flatten(
   api_concepts(term = "pneumonia",
   activeFilter = TRUE,
   limit = 10))
#>    conceptId active definitionStatus           moduleId effectiveTime        id
#> 1  233604007   TRUE    FULLY_DEFINED 900000000000207008      20150131 233604007
#> 2  161525004   TRUE    FULLY_DEFINED 900000000000207008      20040731 161525004
#> 3  416916004   TRUE        PRIMITIVE 900000000000207008      20050731 416916004
#> 4  300999006   TRUE    FULLY_DEFINED 900000000000207008      20160731 300999006
